Song.title: He Is Jesus
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Stephen Altrogge Â© 2003 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [||: Am F | G | Am F | G :|| G] VERSE 1: There's a [C]treasure [F]great in [C]beauty, [F]Far sur[C]passing [G]earth's great [C]wealth He is [C]Jesus, [F]Prince of [C]Glory, [F]Source of [C]all grace, [G]peace, and [C]health There's a [Am]fountain [F]ever [G]flowing, Satis[Am]fying [F]all who [G]drink He is [C]Jesus, [F]spring of [C]joy, To [F]all who [C]hail Him [G]as their [C (to intro)]King
VERSE 2: There's a [C]power, [F]holy [C]power, [F]Breaking [C]bonds of [G]captive [C]men He is [C]Jesus, [F]mighty [C]Jesus, [F]Holy [C]warrior and [G]sinner's [C]friend There's a [Am]Savior [F]rich in [G]mercy, Quick to [Am]pardon [F]all our [G]sins He is [C]Jesus, [F]great Re[C]deemer, [F]Recon[C]ciling [G]God and [C | C]man
{key:C} VERSE 3: There's a [C]glorious Lord returning, and all will [C]bow to [G]Him a[C]lone He is [C]Jesus, [F]King of [C]nations, [F]reigning [C]from His [G]gracious [C]throne There is [Am]one to [F]whom our [Gsus4]prais[G]es, will through [Am]every [F]age as[Gsus4]cend He is [C]Jesus, [F]King for[C]ever, Whose [F]wonderous [C]rule will [G]never [C | C F/C | C F/C | C G | C]end
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 theres a treasure great in beauty far surpassing earths great wealth he is jesus prince of glory source of all grace peace and health theres a fountain ever flowing satisfying all who drink he is jesus spring of joy to all who hail him as their king verse 2 theres a power holy power breaking bonds of captive men he is jesus mighty jesus holy warrior and sinners friend theres a savior rich in mercy quick to pardon all our sins he is jesus great redeemer reconciling god and man verse 3 theres a glorious lord returning and all will bow to him alone he is jesus king of nations reigning from his gracious throne there is one to whom our praises will through every age ascend he is jesus king forever whose wonderous rule will never end

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [||: Am F | G | Am F | G :|| G] VERSE 1: There's a [C]treasure [F]great in [C]beauty, [F]Far sur[C]passing [G]earth's great [C]wealth He is [C]Jesus, [F]Prince of [C]Glory, [F]Source of [C]all grace, [G]peace, and [C]health There's a [Am]fountain [F]ever [G]flowing, Satis[Am]fying [F]all who [G]drink He is [C]Jesus, [F]spring of [C]joy, To [F]all who [C]hail Him [G]as their [C (to intro)]King
VERSE 2: There's a [C]power, [F]holy [C]power, [F]Breaking [C]bonds of [G]captive [C]men He is [C]Jesus, [F]mighty [C]Jesus, [F]Holy [C]warrior and [G]sinner's [C]friend There's a [Am]Savior [F]rich in [G]mercy, Quick to [Am]pardon [F]all our [G]sins He is [C]Jesus, [F]great Re[C]deemer, [F]Recon[C]ciling [G]God and [C | C]man
{key:D} VERSE 3: There's a [D]glorious Lord returning, and all will [D]bow to [A]Him a[D]lone He is [D]Jesus, [G]King of [D]nations, [G]reigning [D]from His [A]gracious [D]throne There is [Bm]one to [G]whom our [Asus4]prais[A]es, will through [Bm]every [G]age as[Asus4]cend He is [D]Jesus, [G]King for[D]ever, Whose [G]wonderous [D]rule will [A]never [D | D G/D | D G/D | D A | D]end
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 theres a treasure great in beauty far surpassing earths great wealth he is jesus prince of glory source of all grace peace and health theres a fountain ever flowing satisfying all who drink he is jesus spring of joy to all who hail him as their king verse 2 theres a power holy power breaking bonds of captive men he is jesus mighty jesus holy warrior and sinners friend theres a savior rich in mercy quick to pardon all our sins he is jesus great redeemer reconciling god and man verse 3 theres a glorious lord returning and all will bow to him alone he is jesus king of nations reigning from his gracious throne there is one to whom our praises will through every age ascend he is jesus king forever whose wonderous rule will never end
